title: Daze
contents: text | <span style='font-size:10px'> You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.
text | <span style='font-size:10px'> Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

title: Electric Arc
contents: text | <span style='font-size:10px'> An arc of Lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal electricity damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
text | <span style='font-size:10px'> Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

title: Produce Flame
contents: text | <span style='font-size:8px'> A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach.
bullet | Critical Success The target takes double damage and 1d4 persistent fire damage.
bullet | Success You deal 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier fire damage.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

title: Mage Hand
contents: property | Targets | 1 unattended object of light Bulk

text | <span style='font-size:10px'> You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

title: Mage Hand (continued)
contents: description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (3rd) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (5th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (7th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

title: Read Aura
contents: text | <span style='font-size:8px'> You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the level of your read aura spell.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (3rd) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  You can target up to 10 objects.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (6th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  You can target any number of objects.

title: Telekinetic Projectile
contents: text | <span style='font-size:8px'> You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a ranged attack against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage—as appropriate for the object you hurled—equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.
bullet | Critical Success You deal double damage.
bullet | Success You deal full damage.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

title: Protect Companion
contents: property | Duration | until the start of your next turn

text | <span style='font-size:8px'> You extend your aura, as a magical shield that protects your eidolon or minion. Target gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC for duration. Gain reaction; after using, you can't cast protect companion again for 10 minutes.
text | Life Block [reaction] Trigger: Target would take dmg; Effect: Reduce dmg by 10, but you lose 5 HP. Even if this reduces the dmg to 0, target still takes effects (e.g. psn).

text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightening (+2) Reaction reduces the dmg by another 10, and you lose 5 more HP. If you want to lose fewer HP, you can choose to lower the dmg reduction and HP lost to what any lower-level version of the spell could do without lowering the spell's actual level.

title: Warp Step
contents: text | <span style='font-size:10px'> When you walk, the earth warps beneath your feet - your steps extend, distance contracts, and everything is just a little bit closer.

text | <span style='font-size:10px'> You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your turn. You then Stride twice. You can use warp step to Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.

title: Tame
contents: property | Saving Throw | Will; Duration 1 minute

text | <span style='font-size:9px'> You make comforting sounds and approach the target in a friendly manner. You improve the target's attitude to you by one step (unfriendly to neutral, neutral to friendly, friendly to helpful) for the duration. Afterward, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (+3) The duration becomes 10 minutes.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (+6) The duration becomes 1 hour.

title: Guidance
contents: property | Duration | until the start of your next turn

text | <span style='font-size:10px'> You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.
